Experience seamless translation into sign language with the Let'sTalkSign Arya model. Simply perform a single tap on any text or button to interpret the contents effortlessly.

To activate a button or select a UI element, press and hold the desired button or element using one finger. Then, perform a double-tap anywhere on the screen with another finger to execute the click action.

Accessibility swipe actions are akin to general swipe actions, with the distinction that you need to use two fingers for the gesture. Perform a left swipe by swiping from left to right with two fingers, and execute a right swipe by moving from right to left with two fingers. Similarly, perform top and bottom swipes by using two fingers and swiping from top to bottom or bottom to top, respectively.
Use Accessibility Gestures to select the required text to interpret in Chrome.
Note: Make sure you have given the accessibility and overlay permission.
Use Accessibility Gestures to select the required text to interpret in other apps.
